title: Executive Order 7631-Power-Site Restoration No. 483, Partial Revocation of Executive Order of October 23, 1914, Creating Power-Site Reserve No. 451
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, 37 Stat. 497, the Executive Order of October 23, 1914, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 451, as affected by Power-Site Interpretation No. 231, approved November 22, 1934, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:

T. 25 N., R. 10 E.,      Sec. 1, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, NW¼SW¼, and SE¼SW¼;      Sec. 2, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5, S½NW¼, and N½SE¼;      Sec. 3, lot 1;      Sec. 12, lots 1 and 2, W½NE¼, NE¼NW¼, N½SE¼, and SE¼SE¼;      Sec. 13, E½E½.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7631-Power-Site Restoration No. 483, Partial Revocation of Executive Order of October 23, 1914, Creating Power-Site Reserve No. 451 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368989
